```{r}
library(Lahman)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
mlb <- Teams %>% 
    filter(yearID > 1900) %>%
    select(teamID, yearID, lgID, G, W, L, R, RA) %>%
    mutate(RD = R - RA, 
           Wpct = W / (W + L))

mlb_pyt <- mlb %>%
    mutate(log_w_ratio = log(W/L),
           log_r_ratio = log(R / RA))
pyt_fit <- lm(log_w_ratio ~ -1 + log_r_ratio, data = mlb_pyt)
coef(pyt_fit)

library(nhlapi)

nhl <- nhl_standings(seasons = 2021:2022)

```
